body:
The same on latest version (7.41.5)
LInk https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-v7-controller-ts-forked-8ikori?file=/package.json:391-397

`formState` is initiated with `isValid: false` by default _(we can't know the "correct" value until both the hook and the components are rendered in that order)_. As you're using a field level validation _(`Controller` `rules`)_, form needs to "evaluate" the inputs in the form and their "rules" and set the correct `isValid` value on next re-render

You can remove React.StrictMode component and isValid stays false 
https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-v7-controller-ts-forked-8ikori?file=/src/index.tsx
@Moshyfawn is isValid changing from `false` to `true` expected behaviour?

> @Moshyfawn is isValid changing from false to true expected behaviour?

My bad, I read the `true` & `false` values wrong. Let's see..

@bluebill1049 it seems like whatever is causing it is fixed in `origin/master` and was related to [this executeBuiltInValidation call](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/blob/master/src/logic/createFormControl.ts#L165).

You can checkout [this codespace](https://codesandbox.io/p/github/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/fix/9765?create=true&file=%2Fapp%2Fsrc%2Fbasic.tsx&selection=%5B%7B%22endColumn%22%3A26%2C%22endLineNumber%22%3A24%2C%22startColumn%22%3A26%2C%22startLineNumber%22%3A24%7D%5D&workspace=%257B%2522activeFileId%2522%253A%2522cl7ifn02s003yloi3cdqdgc0e%2522%252C%2522openFiles%2522%253A%255B%2522%252FREADME.md%2522%252C%2522%252Fapp%252Fsrc%252Fbasic.tsx%2522%252C%2522%252Fapp%252Fsrc%252Fmain.tsx%2522%255D%252C%2522sidebarPanel%2522%253A%2522EXPLORER%2522%252C%2522gitSidebarPanel%2522%253A%2522COMMIT%2522%252C%2522spaces%2522%253A%257B%2522clctnaj5r001d2e69czcfw6uw%2522%253A%257B%2522key%2522%253A%2522clctnaj5r001d2e69czcfw6uw%2522%252C%2522name%2522%253A%2522Default%2522%252C%2522devtools%2522%253A%255B%257B%2522type%2522%253A%2522UNASSIGNED_PORT%2522%252C%2522port%2522%253A3000%252C%2522url%2522%253A%2522cktvkw-3000.preview.csb.app%2522%252C%2522key%2522%253A%2522clctneuyn020y2e69gj3126k5%2522%252C%2522isMinimized%2522%253Afalse%257D%252C%257B%2522type%2522%253A%2522TERMINAL%2522%252C%2522shellId%2522%253A%2522clctnau7n00038vjoe27hg1hk%2522%252C%2522key%2522%253A%2522clctnau1300bg2e693exwlzr9%2522%252C%2522isMinimized%2522%253Afalse%257D%255D%257D%257D%252C%2522currentSpace%2522%253A%2522clctnaj5r001d2e69czcfw6uw%2522%252C%2522spacesOrder%2522%253A%255B%2522clctnaj5r001d2e69czcfw6uw%2522%255D%257D): navigate to [Basic `onChange` test](https://cktvkw-3000.preview.csb.app/basic/onChange) and see that `isValid` is `false`
thanks a lot @Moshyfawn I will release the minor update today.

@bluebill1049 

It seems the root cause is from line 97 in `useController.ts` when `useEffect` hook performs clean up callback twice in React.StrictMode that causes setting flag `mount` to false.

https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/blob/4b4f1d8a5436ba84b9316a82788852adbd240db2/src/useController.ts#L76-L99

With `mount=false`, validation will be stopped and always return valid state.

https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/blob/4b4f1d8a5436ba84b9316a82788852adbd240db2/src/logic/validateField.ts#L54-L55
yes @leapful you are right. I get deep-fried by this `useEffect` twice in strict mode. Try to figure out a solution to this.
